OOC: THANK YOU!

I have only posted twice  (counting this) because I have no idea what is
going on.  Right now, I am preparing for Botcon, so I don't have time to
read the messages.  Also, my dad reinstalled Netscape 2-3 times since I
wrote in my character, so I've lost almost all of the messages.  My dad
is getting a bit freaked out when we log on and receive at LEAST 50
messages at a time.  I don't know if anyone has said what is going on,
as I have to just drag them all to my folder before reading the
messages.

I think we should have a message board instead of an e-mail system, just
to make things easier.  Well, tell me what you think on Sunday.  I'm
going to Botcon for the weekend.  'Later.


Anolis
